dModify module¶

dModify.getAssignedTicketList(username)¶

Obtains a sorted list of the identifiers of the user’s assigned tickets.

Parameters:username (String) – Username of the user to get its assigned tickets
Returns:Integer List
dModify.getUserList()¶

Obtains a sorted list of all the users usernames.

Returns:String List
dModify.getTicketInfo(id)¶

Obtains a list of the responsible’s username, priority and state of a ticket.

Parameters:id (Integer) – Ticket identifier
Returns:String List
dModify.updateTicket(id, responsible, priority, state)¶

Modifies a ticket.

Parameters:
  • id (Integer) – Ticket identifier to be modified
  • responsible (String) – Username of the new user assigned to the ticket
  • priority (String) – New priority
  • state (String) – New state
